trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for design-time data source view classes.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> class using the specified data source designer and view name.
The parent data source designer.
The name of the view in the data source.
owner is `null`
-or-
viewName is `null`.

Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports paging through the data that is retrieved by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)"></xref> method.
`true` if paging through the data retrieved by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)"></xref> method is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports retrieving the total number of data rows instead of the data itself.
`true` if retrieving the total number of data rows is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports a sorted view on the underlying data source.
`true` if a sorted view on the underlying data source is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method is supported; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a reference to the designer that created this <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> control.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner"></xref> object provided when the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> instance was created.
Generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control using the specified number of rows, indicating whether it is returning sample data or real data.
The minimum number of rows to return.
`true` to indicate that the returned data is sample data; `false` to indicate that the returned data is live data.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object containing data to display at design time.
Gets the name of the view as provided when this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> class was created.
The view name.
Gets a schema that describes the data source view that is represented by this view object.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"></xref> object.
